title: Does Febreze Contain Peanut Oil?
subtitle: Social media users shared anecdotal reports of undeclared peanut and tree nut oils or byproducts in Febreze and other Procter & Gamble products, but P&G stated their non-food items are either appropriately labeled or nut-free.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Febreze and other Procter & Gamble products contain undeclared peanut and tree nut oils or byproducts, posing a risk to individuals with nut allergies.
